articles.title: Pixel 6 wallpapers leak w/ colorful plant and flower theme
articles.description: The wallpapers from the upcoming Pixel 6 series have leaked and show off a plant and flower theme for Google's flagships.
articles.content:
Google always introduces a batch of wallpapers with its new Pixel, and it seems the Pixel 6 series will be no exception, as a fresh leak has just revealed the next batch of new designs.

articles.title: Movistar confirm Miguel Angel Lopez will leave team after sudden Vuelta a España abandon
articles.description: Colombian's contract will be dissolved as of October 1
articles.content:
Movistar have announced that Miguel Ángel López will depart the team on October 1 in the aftermath of his sudden abandon on the penultimate stage of the Vuelta a España.

articles.title: Drag Race UK season 3's Choriza May calls out xenophobic fans
articles.description: Drag Race UK season 3 contestant Choriza May took to Twitter to call out fans saying she should have competed on Drag Race Espana, calling it xenophobic.
articles.content:
Drag Race UK season three contestant Choriza May has called out xenophobic fans after reportedly receiving comments saying she should have applied for the Spanish version of the show.

articles.title: Eiking signs with EF Education-Nippo
articles.description: Norwegian who led Vuelta a España for seven stages leaves Intermarché-Wanty-Gobert
articles.content:
EF Education-Nippo announced the signing of talented Norwegian Odd Christian Eiking on Wednesday. The 26-year-old joins the American squad after a highly successful Vuelta a España, where he led the race for seven stages and finished 11th overall.

articles.title: US Open 2021: Superstitions to keep Leylah Fernandez's dad/coach from maiden major final
articles.description: Fernandez, a former footballer from Ecuador who became a tennis coach for his daughter, will watch from home in Florida as he has for two weeks when 19-year-old Fernandez meets 18-year-old qualifier Raducanu for the title.

articles.title: Ecuador's Petroecuador faces arbitration claims from two contractors
articles.description: Ecuador's state oil company Petroecuador is facing arbitration claims stemming from contractual disputes with two private contractors, the company said on Friday, adding that the processes would not affect crude output.
